headline: DA Davidson Reaffirms Buy on Adobe (ADBE) After Figma’s S-1 Filing
summary: Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) is one of the 13 Best Large Cap Stocks to Buy Right Now. On July 2, DA Davidson maintained its “Buy” rating on Adobe Inc. (NASDAQ:ADBE) with a price target of $500. This decision came after Figma filed its S-1 for an IPO. The research firm pointed out that Figma shows financial […]
